from dna_features_viewer import GraphicFeature, GraphicRecord, CircularGraphicRecord
features = [GraphicFeature(start=5, end=10, strand=+1, color='#ffd700',
    label='bbS-1'), GraphicFeature(start=8, end=15, strand=+1, color=
    '#ffcccc', label='CrC')]
record = GraphicRecord(sequence=7 * 'ATGC', features=features)
ax, _ = record.plot(figure_width=5)
record.plot_sequence(ax)
record.plot_translation(ax, (8, 23), fontdict={'weight': 'bold'})
